attributes.action: give youth a chance for more roles in politics
attributes.additional_details:
I want the best for youth as I hope you do too
we must start giving youth a chance to tell us how they really feel.Letting them be involved with debates etc.. will give them a chance to feel welcome and
accepted in this society it might give them more opportunity's to make the UK a better place for all youth.We could give awards or let them be involved. This could change their thoughts of serious things such as career, politics and education
